start.text: You step softly through a veil of mist. The soul here is curled beside a shuttered window, trembling.

choices.text: Nudge the window open with your paw.
Call softly, 'Do you remember the warmth?'

curl.text: You curl beside them. The silence becomes comfort. Slowly, they breathe easier.

window.text: The window creaks open, letting in a shimmer of starlight. The soul blinks, curious.

call.text: At your words, they shudder. A memory flickers in their eyes, but fades too quickly.

choices.text: Offer them a paw to hold.

sleep.text: You both rest. In dreams, the soul finds a fragment of peace. You know your visit helped.

stars.text: You trace the constellations with your paw. The soul smiles faintly, remembering. Hope glimmers.
